jobDescription: Job DescriptionKaufman Dolowich & Voluck LLP, a rapidly-growing national litigation firm, is seeking an associate for its growing Insurance Coverage & Litigation practice in its New York City office. Qualified candidates will have at least 5 years of experience in complex insurance coverage and claim handling disputes with a focus on professional liability claims. This is an excellent opportunity for someone with case management experience and the ability and desire to take the lead in handling cases. Experience and Skills Litigation experience required, coverage experience a plusSuperior legal research, writing, and verbal communication skillsExceptional attention to detailStrong organizational and time management skillsAt least 5 years of experience working on complex insurance coverage matters, preferably professional liability disputesExcellent academic credentialsAdmission to the NY BarKaufman Dolowich Voluck is not accepting resumes from search firms for this position.
